chapter.title: Network Node
chapter.para: Vboxnet0, Vboxnet1, Vboxnet2 - are virtual networks setup up by virtual box with your host machine. This is the way your host can communicate with the virtual machines. These networks are in turn used by virtual box VM’s for OpenStack networks, so that OpenStack’s services can communicate with each other.
Start your Controller Node the one you setup in previous section.

listitem.para: After you install Ubuntu Server, go in sudo mode
